title: Vaigaraiyil Vaigaikaraiyil Lyrics Payanangal Mudivathillai
stanzas:
un ninaive enakor shruthi
un kanave enakor kirudhi
un unarvil maname urugi
vaaduthammaa
malar pol karugi

pala pala jenmam
naan eduppen
padalgal kodi
naan padippen

aayiram aayiram aasaigalai
aasaiyil unnidam pesa vandhen
aaviyil maeviya seidhigalai
kaelena nenjidam koora vandhen

ninaivugal engo alaigiradhe
kanavugal yeno kalaigiradhe
nizhal pol unnai
thodargirathe.
